title: New: Ryan Power – Mondo Rush
content:
You may remember, (depending on how much of a Joel Chima super fan you are), that I flipped my shit when I heard the debut single to come from Ryan Power’s new LP, I Don’t want to Die. What grabbed me, amongst other things, were the track’s simplicities. The gentle and somber production allowed the lyrics and themes to gently soak in, leaving for a truly moving experience.

Power’s new track is quite the different beast. It trots along with flute like synths as its kitsch motivation, Power’s’ vocals again delivering in both range and frankly in weirdness.

I Don’t Want to Die will be released April 3 by NNA Tapes.

Via No Fear of Pop.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
